wathu sewakayange idam ha niwasa gatalu wisandimata kadinam kriyamarga ganna bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.wishrama yana wathu sewakayan muhunadena niwasa gataluwa pilibandawa rajaya dadi awadhanaya yomu kara thibena bawada ee mahatha prakasha karayi.amathiwaraya me andahas pala kale shri lanka wathu sewaka sangamaye 94wani sanwathsaraya samarima nimiththen kolambaa nawa nagara shalawe di pawathi uthsawayakata ekwemini.ehidi wadi duratath adahas dakwamin basil rajapaksha mahatha meseda kiya.me wruththiya samithiya wasara 94 pura me kshethraye wishala sewawak kala wruththiya samithiyak.

sanath ge mathakaya...aacharya kemadasayan athin mulumaninma sangithaya sapayunu awasan chitha්rapataya wuye sanath gunathilaka adhyakshanaya kala ‘ekamath eka rataka’yi.mita masa kihipayakata ihatha di ohu samanga gathakala sonduru mathakayan ada sanath gunathilaka samaranne kandulu atharini.’mastar mata mulinma munagasenuye 1983 warshaye ekthara dinakadiyi.ee chitha්rapata adhyakshawarayaku wu ti.arjuna ge margayen. 1983 kalu juliya samaye mastar mage hithe dadi lesin satahan wannata hethuwak athiwuna.ee thamayi ee kalaye drawida kala shilpinta karadara sidu wunada kiyala hoyala balanna mastar madihathwima.ohu paudgalikawa drawida sangitha shilpinge niweswalata gihin owun gana hoyala baluwa.roksami mastarge gedarata gihin balana kota ohu athurudan kiyala ohuta danaganna labuna.eeta passe ohu kohomahari roksami inna thana hoyagena thibuna.eeta passe mastar mata katha karala kiwwa ‘sanath roksami saha ohuge pawule udawiya paththalagedara guru niwasaye innawa.sanath enawada math ekka yanna kiyala.
